thread.title: Pros react to the cancellation of Fedor Emelianenko vs. Matt Mitrione at Bellator 172 - MMA Fighting
thread.title_full: Pros react to the cancellation of Fedor Emelianenko vs. Matt Mitrione at Bellator 172 - MMA Fighting

author: Mma Fighting Newswire
title: Pros react to the cancellation of Fedor Emelianenko vs. Matt Mitrione at Bellator 172 - MMA Fighting
text:
share Esther Lin, MMA Fighting 
Disaster struck Bellator on Saturday, as a fight day hospitalization to Matt Mitrione resulted in the cancellation of Bellator 172's headlining bout between Mitrione and heavyweight legend Fedor Emelianenko just hours before the show was slated to kick off in San Jose, Calif. 
As a result, Emelianenko was removed from the card and a lightweight contest between Josh Thomson and Patricky Freire was upgraded into Bellator 172's main event. 
Check out reaction to the disappointing news below. Due to illness, @mattmitrione will be unable to compete tonight at #Bellator172 . @THEREALPUNK vs @PatrickyPitbull promoted to main event.
